hero.description: Passionate about the backend, with a taste for simple and intuitive designs and interfaces. Currently focused on the PostgreSQL-NestJS-React Stack

charliesaboresfs.name: Charlie Sabores Full Stack
charliesaboresfs.description: Online store, implemented with Angular and Angular Material on the frontend and NestJS on the Backend. MySLQ database and ORM Prisma. Deployed on a EC2 instance and RDS in Amazon Web Services.

flowguard.name: Flowguard
flowguard.description: Landing page, implemented with React on the frontend, native CSS styles, with background animations. Deployed in Netlify

portfolio.name: Carlos Salazar Portfolio
portfolio.description: Website with personal portfolio. Implemented with React and MUI on the frontend, and EmailJS as a mail server.

charliesaboresjs.name: Charlie Sabores Javascript
charliesaboresjs.description: Web page developed with HTML, CSS and native Javascript, making extensive use of javascript web components. Deployed on Github Pages.
